languages.text: Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Arch-Militant will make any resistance tests from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .
languages.original_text: Противники, которых архмилитант вынуждает выполнять {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g}, после этого до конца боя совершают любые проверки на сопротивление со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that made any resistance test forced by the Veteran will make any resistance tests from any source with a −<u>(10 + 2 × AGI bonus)</u> penalty until the end of combat .
Enemies that were forced to make a resistance test by the Veteran will make any resistance tests from any source with a −<u>(10 + 2 × AGI bonus)</u> penalty until the end of combat .

Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Arch-Militant will make any resistance tests from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .

Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Veteran will make any resistance tests from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .

Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Arch-Militant will make any resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .

languages.text: 所有由于首席战士造成的效果进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的敌人，在接下来的所有抗性检定中都会额外承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Arch-Militant will make any resistance tests from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .

traits.locale_text: 所有由于首席战士造成的效果进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的敌人，在接下来的所有抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}中都会额外承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
所有由于老兵造成的效果进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的敌人，在接下来的所有抗性检定中都会受到额外{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Los enemigos que tienen que hacer una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} por causa del Archimilitante hacen sus pruebas de fortaleza por cualquier motivo con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Arch-Militant will make any resistance tests from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos que tienen que hacer una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} por causa del Archimilitante hacen sus {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de fortaleza por cualquier motivo con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} hasta el final del combate.

Los enemigos que tienen que hacer una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} por causa del veterano hacen sus pruebas de fortaleza por cualquier motivo con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントにより{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を強制的に受けた敵は、戦闘終了までその他の影響で発生する抵抗判定に対して−{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課せられた状態で受けることになる。
languages.original_text: Enemies that were forced to make a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} by the Arch-Militant will make any resistance tests from any source with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} until the end of combat .

traits.locale_text: 古参（ベテラン）により{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}を強制的に受けた敵は、戦闘終了までその他の影響で発生する抵抗テストに対して−<u>（10 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課せられた状態で受けることになる。
古参（ベテラン）により{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g}を強制的に受けた敵は、戦闘終了までその他の影響で発生する抵抗テストに対して−{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課せられた状態で受けることになる。

Противники, которых ветеран вынуждает проходить {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверку на сопротивление{/g}, после этого до конца боя проходят любые проверки на сопротивление со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108}.

languages.text: Feinde, die vom Erzmilitanten zum Ausführen einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gezwungen wurden, müssen bis zum Ende des Kampfes alle Widerstandsproben mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} bestreiten.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die vom Erzmilitanten zum Ausführen einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} gezwungen wurden, müssen bis zum Ende des Kampfes alle {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsproben{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} bestreiten.

languages.text: Les ennemis que l'archimilitant a contraints à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} passent ceux des autres sources avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Başmilitan tarafından {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmek zorunda bırakılan düşmanlar, çatışma sonuna dek her türlü kaynaktan gelecek direnç testlerine −{uip|ResistancePenalty|1b460fbb306341c3b19992da7b15f108} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} ile girerler.
